trans-unit.target: 适用于 .NET 平台的发布服务器

trans-unit.source: The target framework to publish for. The target framework has to be specified in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 要发布的目标框架。必须在项目文件中指定目标框架。

trans-unit.source: The output directory to place the published artifacts in.
trans-unit.target: 要放置已发布项目的输出目录。

trans-unit.source: The path to a target manifest file that contains the list of packages to be excluded from the publish step.
trans-unit.target: 指向目标清单文件的路径，该文件包含要通过发布步骤执行的包的列表。

trans-unit.source: Do not build the project before publishing. Implies --no-restore.
trans-unit.target: 发布之前不要生成项目。Implies --no-restore.

trans-unit.source: The target runtime to publish for. This is used when creating a self-contained deployment. The default is to publish a framework-dependent application.
trans-unit.target: 针对其发布应用程序的目标运行时。 默认发布不含可执行文件的依赖框架的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The configuration to publish for. The default for most projects is 'Debug'.
trans-unit.target: 要发布的配置。大多数项目的默认值是 "Debug"。

trans-unit.source: Publish the .NET Core runtime with your application so the runtime doesn't need to be installed on the target machine. The default is 'true' if a runtime identifier is specified.
trans-unit.target: 随附应用程序发布 .NET Core 运行时，免除在目标计算机上安装运行时的需求。如果指定了运行时标识符，则默认为 “true”。
